CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Masco Corp is a global leader in design, manufacture and distribution of branded home improvement and building products. The company's segments includes BEHR paint, DELTA, HANSGROHE faucets, bath and shower fixtures, KICHLER decorative and outdoor lighting, LIBERTY branded decorative and functional hardware and HOT SPRING spas. Decorative Architectural Products segment primarily includes architectural coatings, including paints, primers, specialty coatings, stains and waterproofing products as well as paint applicators and accessories.
